messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: A friendly reminder from central command to always worship our lord and savior cthulu! go to your local church to become commited to cthulu as he died on the cross to save us all from eternal Godly fun activites

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: im jerry from athiesm and cthulhu is not real

messages.author: Chief Engineer's Desk
messages.body: SSSupermatter Engine up and running if you ssstill have power troublesss call me

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Solar Array.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Service Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Ionospheric anomalies detected. Temporary telecommunication failu*3mga;b4;'1vï¿½-BZZZT

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention please you are all now elligible for one FREE ass kicking. maybe a little tickle too if youre into that stuff ;)

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Halaal Continent 81 door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention please dont mind the ai hes a fucking retard

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed security level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Halaal Continent 81, please stand-by.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: Captain is to be demoted. As of now is considered no longer the head of this station and is to be apprehended as soon as possible for assault and kidnapping

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: He is armed, SM is critical in securing

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Storage.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: SM is stabilizes, CAP is in brig, this is fucked so il leave the sentence to a jury. Meet in Sec for a trial

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: I stand corrected, Cap is dead. Probbably from rad from sabatoging the SM, no jury required, but your alive so... thats good

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Chief Engineer's Office.
